page.title: 02THE POLICE
page.content: Crickhowell Police belong to the{Dyfed {Powys}Police Force.They have to be 18\ years old before they can join.They also have to be of a certain heigth,5ft4in for a woman and 5ft8in for a man.At Crickhowell station they have one sergeant and five constables.They do not have any women police or any dogs.They have one police car. The station has no cells but it does have a detention room which has a steel door,thick glass on the window and no handle on the inside. The most common crime in Powys is theft.There are about four crimes a week and three out of these are solved.The police answer about thirty five calls a week. None of the police carry guns.If there is a need for guns or sniffer dogs they are brought from Carmarthen.
